items.name: The Golden Sea of Erg Amatlich
items.short_description: Witness the endless ocean of golden sand dunes, resembling a vast, tranquil sea in the heart of the Adrar. Perfect for sunrise and sunset photography.

items.name: Terjit Oasis Desert Shores
items.short_description: Discover the surprising beauty of Terjit Oasis, where lush palms meet clear, spring-fed pools. A verdant haven offering a unique 'coastal' feel in the desert.

items.name: Wadi Chinguetti's Shimmering Sands
items.short_description: Explore the expansive dry riverbed of Wadi Chinguetti, where ancient pathways and vast stretches of sand evoke a sense of timelessness, especially at sunset.

items.name: Adrar Plateau's Horizon View
items.short_description: Ascend to a high point on the Adrar Plateau for breathtaking panoramic views, where the desert horizon stretches like an endless, sandy ocean.

items.name: Atar Grand Souk's Living Tapestry
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in the bustling Grand Souk, a vibrant cultural installation where local crafts, spices, and conversations create a lively sensory experience.

items.name: The Nomadic Heritage Camp
items.short_description: Experience an immersive cultural setup featuring traditional Mauritanian tents, music, and storytelling, offering a glimpse into nomadic desert life.

items.name: Adrar Rock Art Interpretive Gallery
items.short_description: An outdoor installation showcasing ancient rock carvings and paintings found in the Adrar region, telling stories of prehistoric desert inhabitants.

items.name: Ksar Arts & Crafts Hub
items.short_description: A dedicated space in Atar's old town, where local artisans demonstrate traditional crafts like leatherwork and weaving, often displaying their creations.

items.name: Adrar Eco-Lodge Infinity Pool
items.short_description: A stunning infinity pool at an exclusive eco-lodge, offering breathtaking views of the surrounding palm groves and desert landscape, merging water with horizon.

items.name: Duneview Desert Retreat Infinity Pool
items.short_description: Perched on the edge of rolling dunes, this infinity pool provides an illusion of endless water merging directly into the vast, golden desert.

items.name: Chinguetti Stargazer Infinity Pool
items.short_description: An innovative infinity pool designed for celestial viewing, where the water reflects the incredible desert night sky, creating a truly magical experience.

items.name: Adrar Plateau Rim Infinity Dip
items.short_description: Imagine a secluded infinity pool carved into the edge of the Adrar Plateau, offering unparalleled views of the vast desert expanse below.

items.name: Old Atar's Earth Tones District
items.short_description: Wander through the historic quarter, where buildings proudly display shades of ochre, terracotta, and sand, reflecting the desert's natural palette.

items.name: Artisanal Alleyways of Atar Souk
items.short_description: Beyond the main market, discover narrow alleys where workshops and storefronts burst with colorful textiles, pottery, and vibrant goods against sand-colored walls.

items.name: Desert Oasis Paint Palette
items.short_description: A charming, imagined district near an oasis where homes are painted in gentle, sun-faded pastels, contrasting beautifully with the deep green palms and golden sands.

items.name: Sunrise Gate District
items.short_description: This district, leading to the ancient parts of Atar, features doorways and accents in deep blues and greens, said to ward off evil and welcome the morning sun.

items.name: Adrar Story Walls
items.short_description: Large-scale murals across public walls in Atar depicting historical events, local legends, and the journey of nomadic tribes across the Adrar desert.

items.name: Oasis Life Gallery
items.short_description: Vibrant murals celebrating the flora, fauna, and human connection to water in Mauritania's oases, bringing splashes of green and blue to the city's palette.
items.location_hint: Near Terjit Oasis entrance / Atar's park areas

items.name: Desert Nomadic Scroll Mural
items.short_description: A sprawling, continuous mural depicting the nomadic journey, its challenges, and resilience, using traditional patterns and contemporary artistic styles.

items.name: Chinguetti Calligraphy Mural
items.short_description: An artistic installation inspired by the ancient manuscripts of Chinguetti, featuring large-scale Arabic calligraphy and traditional patterns on old town walls.

items.name: The Eye of Africa (Richat Structure)
items.short_description: A colossal, circular geological formation visible from space, often called 'The Eye of Africa,' offering a truly unique and mysterious natural spectacle.

items.name: Terjit Oasis Grotto & Springs
items.short_description: Explore the hidden grottoes and natural springs within the Terjit Oasis, a breathtaking contrast of lush greenery and ancient rock formations in the arid desert.

items.name: Erg Amatlich Singing Dunes
items.short_description: Experience the rare phenomenon of 'singing dunes' in Erg Amatlich, where shifting sands create deep, resonant sounds, a truly magical desert experience.

items.name: White Valley Moonscape
items.short_description: Discover a surreal landscape of pale, eroded rock formations and chalky canyons that resemble a lunar surface, providing a striking contrast to the typical golden desert.

items.name: Atar Desert Institute
items.short_description: A striking example of modern desert architecture, this institute features clean lines, sustainable design, and local materials, blending seamlessly with the arid surroundings.

items.name: Adrar Gateway Pavilion
items.short_description: A sleek, minimalist pavilion serving as a welcome center, its geometric forms and shaded courtyards offer a cool respite and modern architectural beauty.

items.name: Sahara Eco-Dome Retreat
items.short_description: Futuristic and eco-conscious domes designed for minimal environmental impact, offering unique desert living with panoramic views and sustainable features.

items.name: Oasis Sky Observation Deck
items.short_description: A contemporary structure offering elevated views over an oasis and the vast desert, designed with sleek lines and open spaces to connect visitors with the landscape.

items.name: Chinguetti's Ancient Library Steps
items.short_description: Ascend the weathered stone steps leading to the historic manuscript libraries of Chinguetti, a journey through centuries of scholarly desert heritage.

items.name: Terjit Oasis Palm Stairway
items.short_description: Follow the winding stone and earth steps through the lush Terjit Oasis, surrounded by towering palm trees, leading to hidden springs and tranquil pools.

items.name: Adrar Canyon Ancient Trail
items.short_description: Trek along ancient paths carved into the stunning canyons of the Adrar Plateau, revealing dramatic geological formations and breathtaking desert vistas.

items.name: Erg Amatlich Dune Summit Ascent
items.short_description: The challenging yet rewarding 'path' of footprints leading to the crest of a towering Erg Amatlich dune, offering unparalleled 360-degree desert panoramas.

items.name: The Grand Mosque of Atar
items.short_description: The city's spiritual and architectural heart, this historic mosque with its distinctive minaret is a prominent landmark, especially beautiful at prayer times.

items.name: Chinguetti's Ancient Minaret
items.short_description: The iconic, square-based minaret of the Great Mosque of Chinguetti, a UNESCO World Heritage site and a striking symbol of desert Islamic architecture.

items.name: Adrar Plateau Rock Monoliths
items.short_description: Giant, weather-sculpted rock formations rise majestically from the desert floor on the Adrar Plateau, appearing as ancient guardians of the landscape.

items.name: Old Atar City Gate
items.short_description: A symbolic and well-preserved gate marking the entrance to Atar's historic quarter, reflecting centuries of trade and urban life in the desert.

items.name: Adrar Dune Glamping Retreat
items.short_description: Experience luxury under the stars in bespoke glamping tents nestled amidst the towering dunes of the Adrar, offering comfort and unparalleled desert immersion.

items.name: Oasis Garden Eco-Lodge
items.short_description: A serene eco-lodge hidden within a vibrant oasis, blending traditional design with modern sustainability, offering a tranquil escape amidst palm groves and natural springs.

items.name: Ksar Heritage Boutique Hotel
items.short_description: A beautifully restored traditional ksar (fortified village house) in Atar's old town, offering an authentic yet luxurious stay steeped in local history and architecture.

items.name: Sahara Star-Dome Suites
items.short_description: Innovative transparent dome suites that allow for incredible 360-degree views of the desert and unparalleled stargazing from the comfort of your bed.
